column2: Health;Phnom Penh: The report says that at about 5:20 am
column4: the Police Department of Economic Crimes
column5: in cooperation with ------Camcontrol------ Department confiscated an illegal import  meat from Vietnam. ------A Hyundai truck
column7: was stopped at Chea Sophara road
column11: and about two and a half tons of quails were discovered inside.------After reviewing and discovering that the goods were imported illegally and that the type of meat was defective
column12: the Deputy Prosecutor decided to burn the lot.------The foul fowl were later torched at theChoeung Ek dump site in Dangkor District
column13: Phnom Penh.------The truck was impounded and the driver involved was brought to the department for questioning.------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/731354.html------A
